content: Hiya, I'm {{sudopkw}} - or just sudo or pkw, if you're in a hurry.
Mainly a {{Coder}} and {{Gamer}}, wired into both worlds.
I don’t code as much these days, but when I do, I’m usually deep inside {{Lua}} - exploring and breaking things just to see how they tick.
I occasionally wander into {{C++}}, {{JavaScript}}, and a few other languages that catch my eye.
{{Python}} still gets some love from me, though I plan to dive into {{C}} soon for some chaotic side projects that’ll probably explode... but hey, that’s half the fun.
I’m also itching to tinker more with real-world tech - cracking open gadgets, poking at {{WiFi Deauthers}}, and just generally seeing how far down the rabbit hole goes.
With a bit of free time ({{and maybe a shot of courage}}), I’ll get back to learning the deeper layers of how things really work - that’s the stuff that fuels me.
This whole site is part of my learning sandbox - inspecting the code, reverse-engineering how {{JSON}} and {{JavaScript}} dance together.
Totally not because I’ve got a thing for {{TUI}} setups... nope, definitely not that. ;)
Anyway, here’s a few links if you’re curious - nothing serious, just a few windows into my world. My {{GitHub}}’s down there too.
Yup, I’m a {{Gamer}} too as mentioned. Feel free to swing by my Steam if you wanna add me or drop a comment on my wall.
You can also peek at my TikTok or check out what I’m vibing to on Spoti-Stats.
And of course, my code lair - GitHub.
{{Click}} a section on the left to dig into my {{work}} and past {{experiences}}.
Or just {{navigate}} with the {{arrow keys}} - or {{Vim motions}}, if you’re one of us. {{B)}}
